It performs a series of operations to update, insert, and truncate data across multiple tables, effectively transforming uploaded data into a structured format suitable for further processing or reporting. The procedure handles data related to account billing details, billing summaries, exchange details, meter read details, and payment details.
The complexity of this stored procedure is high due to the following reasons:
It involves multiple operations across several tables, including updates, inserts, and truncations.
It uses conditional logic and function calls to determine values for certain fields.
It processes a significant amount of data, which can impact performance.
It involves data type casting and transformation, which adds to the complexity.

CREATE PROCEDURE [CrisNationalGridWest].[usp_CRIS_TransformUploadedData]
(
	@AuthenticatedUserID AS INT
	,@StatusCode AS INT  OUTPUT
)
AS
BEGIN
	--**************************************************************************************
	--* AUTHOR:       Peter Heller (PAH)
	--* Created On:   10/17/2006
	--**************************************************************************************
	--* Date         Tech Description of Change
	--* ---------- ----  -------------------------------------------------------------
	--* 11/24/2009 PAH  First Version
	--* 11/29/2010 MOH	Update: added the MeterCorrectorID
	--* 11/30/2010 MOH	Update: added logic to null MeterCorrectorID if it is blank string
	--* 01/06/2011 PAH	Update: OBD Bill Type Converted to current period bill with no spans
	--*					and the from and to dates are equal to the bill render date
	--***************************************************************************************

	-- WE SHOULD NOT BE GETTING BILLINGPERIOD REVISION IN FUTURE BILLINGPERIOD
	UPDATE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetailPreload
	SET BillingPeriodRevision = BillingPeriod
	WHERE BillingPeriodRevision > BillingPeriod;

	TRUNCATE TABLE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail;

	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
		(UtilityCompanySeqid, AccountInvoiceBillingGroup, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber, MeterReadWorkDay, 
		UtilityServiceAccountName, UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime, ActivityDateTime,TransactionCode, 
		SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber, GasRateCode, BillFrequency, EstimatedOrActualBillingCode, GasChargeAmount, BillingFromDate, BillingToDate, 
		BillRenderDate, BillingDays, BilledCCF, ThermFactor, BilledTherms, NumberOfMeters, BillType, CommodityChargeAmount, DeliveryChargeAmount, 
		MTACommodityTax, MTADeliveryTax, SalesTax, SystemBenefitsCharge, RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, DeliveryRateSurcharge, 
		RealTimeNormalizationCharge, LatePaymentCharge, PaperBillCharge, CommodityCostFactor, MTACommodityFactor, MTADeliveryFactor, 
		SalesTaxFactor, SystemBenefitChargeFactor, RetailDecouplingMechanismFactor, DeliveryRateSurchargeFactor, RealTimeNormalizationFactor, 
		LatePaymentFactor, CurrentAccountBalance, AccountArrears, TerminationBalance, TotalPaymentsPosted, DateLastPayment, 
		MiscellaneousChargeAmount, MiscellaneousChargeType, Notes, AuthenticatedUserID, DateAdded, LastUpdate, FireAuditTrigger,
		CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision, FirstBillingPeriodCanceled, IsSpannedBilling, NumberOfBillingPeriod, IsCurrentPeriodExchange
		,ExcludeAndReview, SpecialLedgerWorkDay)
	SELECT CAST(UtilityCompanyID AS int), CAST(AccountBillingGroup AS int), BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber+'0000', MeterReadWorkDay, 
		UtilityServiceAccountName, UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, CAST(ActivityCode AS int), ActivityDate, ActivityTime ,cast([ActivityDate]+' '+[ActivityTime] as datetime),TransactionCode, 
		SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber, GasRateCode, BillFrequency, EstimatedOrActualBillingCode, CAST(GasChargeAmount AS money), BillingFromDate, 
		BillingToDate, BillRenderDate, CAST(BillingDays AS int), CAST(BilledCCF AS int), CAST(ThermFactor AS numeric(6, 4)), CAST(BilledTherms AS int), 
		CAST(NumberOfMeters AS int), BillType, CAST(CommodityChargeAmount AS money), CAST(DeliveryChargeAmount AS money), 
		CAST(MTACommodityTax AS money), CAST(MTADeliveryTax AS money), CAST(SalesTax AS money), CAST(SystemBenefitsCharge AS money), 
		CAST(RetailDecouplingMechanismCharge AS money), CAST(DeliveryRateSurcharge AS money), CAST(RealTimeNormalizationCharge AS money), 
		CAST(LatePaymentCharge AS money), CAST(PaperBillCharge AS money), CAST(CommodityCostFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), 
		CAST(MTACommodityFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), CAST(MTADeliveryFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), CAST(SalesTaxFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), 
		CAST(SystemBenefitChargeFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), CAST(RetailDecouplingMechanismFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), 
		CAST(DeliveryRateSurchargeFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), CAST(RealTimeNormalizationFactor AS numeric(7, 5)), CAST(LatePaymentFactor AS numeric(7, 
		5)), CAST(CurrentAccountBalance AS money), CAST(AccountArrears AS money), CAST(TerminationBalance AS money), 
		CAST(TotalPaymentsPosted AS money), DateLastPayment, CAST(MiscellaneousChargeAmount AS money), MiscellaneousChargeType,NULL,1,--@AuthenticatedUserID,
		GETDATE(),GETDATE(),'N',
		case 
			when CrisNationalGridWest.DetermineBillingPeriodRevisionByToDate(BillingToDate) > BillingPeriod 
			then BillingPeriod 
			else CrisNationalGridWest.DetermineBillingPeriodRevisionByToDate(BillingToDate)
		end as CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision,
		CASE when CrisNationalGridWest.DetermineFirstPeriodCanceledByAccountElseFromDate(AccountNumber+'0000',3,BillingFromDate) > BillingPeriodRevision 
				then BillingPeriodRevision 
				else CrisNationalGridWest.DetermineFirstPeriodCanceledByAccountElseFromDate(AccountNumber+'0000',3,BillingFromDate)
		END AS FirstBillingPeriodCanceled,
		'N' AS IsSpannedBilling, 
		NULL AS NumberOfBillingPeriod, 
		'N' AS IsCurrentPeriodExchange
		,'N' AS ExcludeAndReview,SpecialLedgerWorkDay
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetailPreload;
	
	PRINT 'CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail row count: '+str(@@rowcount);

	-- update number of billing period 
	UPDATE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
	SET NumberOfBillingPeriod = dbo.CalculateDeltaBillingPeriods(FirstBillingPeriodCanceled, BillingPeriodRevision, 'M'),
		IsSpannedBilling = CASE WHEN FirstBillingPeriodCanceled <> BillingPeriodRevision then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END;

	-- update IsSpannedBilling
	UPDATE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail
	SET ActivityDateTime = null
	WHERE ActivityDateTime <> (SELECT MAX(ActivityDateTime) AS maxActivityDateTime
		FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail AS b
		WHERE      (CrisNationalGridWest.UploadAccountBillingDetail.AccountNumber = b.AccountNumber));

	TRUNCATE TABLE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadBillingSummary;

	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.UploadBillingSummary
		(UtilityCompanySeqid, InvoiceBillingGroup, BillingPeriod, OriginalAdjustment, GasRateCode, TotalBilledAmount, TotalCanceledAmount, 
		TotalNetAmount, TotalBilledCCF, TotalCanceledCCF, TotalNetCCF, TotalBilledTherms, TotalCanceledTherms, TotalNetTherms, 
		TotalBilledMTACommodityTax, TotalBilledMTADeliveryTax, TotalBilledDeliveryChargeAmount, TotalBilledCommodityChargeAmount, 
		TotalBilledSalesTax, TotalBilledSystemBenefitsCharge, TotalBilledRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, TotalBilledPaperBillCharge, 
		TotalCanceledMTACommodityTax, TotalCanceledMTADeliveryTax, TotalCanceledDeliveryChargeAmount, TotalCanceledCommodityChargeAmount, 
		TotalCanceledSalesTax, TotalCanceledSystemBenefitsCharge, TotalCanceledRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, TotalCanceledPaperBillCharge, 
		TotalNetMTACommodityTax, TotalNetMTADeliveryTax, TotalNetDeliveryChargeAmount, TotalNetCommodityChargeAmount, TotalNetSalesTax, 
		TotalNetSystemBenefitsCharge, TotalNetRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge, TotalNetPaperBillCharge, TotalPaymentsPosted, TotalNetCredits, 
		TotalNetCreditsFinalledAccounts, FireAuditTrigger, Notes, AuthenticatedUserID, DateAdded, LastUpdate, TotalDeliveryRateSurcharge, 
		TotalRealTimeNormalizationCharge, TotalCanceledDeliveryRateSurcharge, TotalCanceledRealTimeNormalizationCharge, 
		TotalNetDeliveryRateSurcharge, TotalNetRealTimeNormalizationCharge)
	SELECT CAST(UtilityCompanySeqid AS int), CAST(InvoiceBillingGroup AS int), BillingPeriod, OriginalAdjustment, GasRateCode, CAST(TotalBilledAmount AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledAmount AS money), CAST(TotalNetAmount AS money), CAST(TotalBilledCCF AS int), CAST(TotalCanceledCCF AS int), 
		CAST(TotalNetCCF AS int), CAST(TotalBilledTherms AS int), CAST(TotalCanceledTherms AS int), CAST(TotalNetTherms AS int), 
		CAST(TotalBilledMTACommodityTax AS money), CAST(TotalBilledMTADeliveryTax AS money), CAST(TotalBilledDeliveryChargeAmount AS money), 
		CAST(TotalBilledCommodityChargeAmount AS money), CAST(TotalBilledSalesTax AS money), CAST(TotalBilledSystemBenefitsCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalBilledRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge AS money), CAST(TotalBilledPaperBillCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledMTACommodityTax AS money), CAST(TotalCanceledMTADeliveryTax AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledDeliveryChargeAmount AS money), CAST(TotalCanceledCommodityChargeAmount AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledSalesTax AS money), CAST(TotalCanceledSystemBenefitsCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge AS money), CAST(TotalCanceledPaperBillCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalNetMTACommodityTax AS money), CAST(TotalNetMTADeliveryTax AS money), CAST(TotalNetDeliveryChargeAmount AS money), 
		CAST(TotalNetCommodityChargeAmount AS money), CAST(TotalNetSalesTax AS money), CAST(TotalNetSystemBenefitsCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalNetRetailDecouplingMechanismCharge AS money), CAST(TotalNetPaperBillCharge AS money), CAST(TotalPaymentsPosted AS money), 
		CAST(TotalNetCredits AS money), CAST(TotalNetCreditsFinalledAccounts AS money),'N',NULL,1, --@AuthenticatedUserID,
		GETDATE(),GETDATE(),
		CAST(TotalDeliveryRateSurcharge AS money), CAST(TotalRealTimeNormalizationCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalCanceledDeliveryRateSurcharge AS money), CAST(TotalCanceledRealTimeNormalizationCharge AS money), 
		CAST(TotalNetDeliveryRateSurcharge AS money), CAST(TotalNetRealTimeNormalizationCharge AS money)
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadBillingSummaryPreload;

	PRINT 'CrisNationalGridWest.UploadBillingSummaryPreload row count: '+str(@@rowcount);

	TRUNCATE TABLE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadExchangeDetail;

	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.UploadExchangeDetail
		(UtilityCompanyID, AccountBillingGroup, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber, MeterReadWorkDay, UtilityServiceAccountName, 
		UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime, ActivityDateTime,TransactionCode, SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber, 
		SpecialLedgerWorkDay, ExchangeCode, MeterNumber, MeterConstant, NumberOfDials, MeterType, GasRateCode, RateCodeChangeDate, MeterStatus, 
		OldMeterStatus, MeterEffectiveActionDate, MeterStatusChangeReason, AccountTerminationDate, AccountStatus, OldAccountStatus, OldMeterNumber, 
		AccountStartDate, OldGasRateCode, OldMeterReadWorkDay,AuthenticatedUserID)
	SELECT cast(UtilityCompanyID as int), cast(AccountBillingGroup as int), BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber, MeterReadWorkDay, UtilityServiceAccountName, 
			UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime,cast([ActivityDate]+' '+[ActivityTime] as datetime), TransactionCode, SpecialLedgerAccountNUmber, 
			SpecialLedgerWorkDay, ExchangeCode, MeterNumber, MeterConstant, NumberOfDials, cast(MeterType as varchar(1)), GasRateCode, RateCodeChangeDate, MeterStatus, 
			OldMeterStatus, MeterEffectiveActionDate, MeterStatusChangeReason, AccountTerminationDate, AccountStatus, OldAccountStatus, OldMeterNumber, 
			AccountStartDate, OldGasRateCode, OldMeterReadWorkDay,@AuthenticatedUserID
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadExchangeDetailPreload;
	
	PRINT 'CrisNationalGridWest.UploadExchangeDetailPreload row count: '+str(@@rowcount);

	TRUNCATE TABLE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetail;

	INSERT INTO [CrisNationalGridWest].[UploadMeterReadDetail]
        ([UtilityCompanySeqid]
        ,[AccountInvoiceBillingGroup]
        ,[BillingPeriod]
        ,[BillingPeriodRevision]
        ,[CalculatedBillingPeriodRevision]
        ,[FirstBillingPeriodCanceled]
        ,[AccountNumber]
        ,[MeterReadWorkDay]
        ,[UtilityServiceAccountName]
        ,[UtilityServiceAddress]
        ,[Borough]
        ,[Zipcode]
        ,[State]
        ,[ActivityCode]
        ,[ActivityDate]
        ,[ActivityTime]
        ,[ActivityDateTime]
        ,[TransactionCode]
        ,[SpecialLedgerAccountNumber]
        ,[SpecialLedgerWorkDay]
        ,[MeterNumber]
        ,[MeterConstant]
        ,[NumberOfDials]
        ,[MeterReadType]
        ,[EstimatedOrActual]
        ,[BillingTransactionCode]
        ,[MeterReadStatus]
        ,[MeterReadSource]
        ,[MeterReadReason]
        ,[MeterType]
        ,[MeterReadingFromDate]
        ,[MeterReadingToDate]
        ,[MeterFromReading]
        ,[MeterToReading]
        ,[MeterReadTime]
        ,[MeterCCF]
        ,[Therms]
        ,[ThermsFactor]
        ,[GasRateCode]
        ,[FixFactor]
        ,[PartSupplied]
        ,[HasMeterRolledOver]
        ,MeterCorrectorID
        ,[IsCancel]
        ,[IsProcessed]
        ,[ExcludeAndReview]
        ,[FireAuditTrigger]
        ,[Notes]
        ,[AuthenticatedUserID]
        ,[DateAdded]
        ,[LastUpdate])
	SELECT CAST(UtilityCompanyId AS INT)
        ,CAST(AccountBillingGroup AS INT)
        ,BillingPeriod
        ,BillingPeriodRevision
        ,NULL
        ,NULL
        ,AccountNumber+'0000'
        ,MeterReadWorkDay
        ,UtilityServiceAccountName
        ,UtilityServiceAddress
        ,Borough
        ,Zipcode
        ,[State]
        ,ActivityCode
        ,ActivityDate
        ,ActivityTime
        ,CAST(ActivityDate+' '+ActivityTime AS DATETIME)
        ,TransactionCode
        ,SpecialLedgerAccountNumber
        ,SpecialLedgerWorkDay
        ,MeterNumber
        ,MeterConstant
        ,NumberOfDials
        ,MeterReadType
        ,EstimatedOrActual
	    ,CASE WHEN ActivityCode ='0827' AND MeterReadStatus ='X' THEN 'BC' ELSE 'BI' END
		,MeterReadStatus
        ,MeterReadSource
        ,MeterReadReason
        ,MeterType
        ,MeterReadingFromDate
        ,MeterReadingToDate
        ,CAST(MeterFromReading AS int)
        ,CAST(MeterToReading AS int)
        ,MeterReadTime
        ,CAST(MeterCCF AS int)
        ,NULL
        ,NULL
        ,NULL
        ,CAST(FixFactor AS DECIMAL(6,4))
        ,PartSupplied
        ,case when HasMeterRolledOver = 0 then 'N' else 'Y' end
        ,CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(MeterCorrectorID)) = '' THEN NULL ELSE LTRIM(RTRIM(MeterCorrectorID)) END
        ,'N'
        ,'N'
        ,'N'
        ,'N'
        ,NULL
        ,1
        ,GETDATE()
        ,GETDATE()
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetailPreload;
		
	PRINT 'CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetailPreload row count: '+str(@@rowcount);

	TRUNCATE TABLE CrisNationalGridWest.UploadPaymentDetail;

	DECLARE @PaymentBillingPeriod AS VARCHAR(6);

	SELECT @PaymentBillingPeriod = PreviousBillingPeriodOneMonth FROM Billing.ApplicationTimeFrame WHERE CurrentProcessingPeriod = 'Y';

	INSERT INTO CrisNationalGridWest.UploadPaymentDetail
		(UtilityCompanySeqid, AccountInvoiceBillingGroup, BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber, MeterReadWorkDay, 
		UtilityServiceAccountName, UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, ZipCode, State, ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime,ActivityDateTime, TransactionCode, 
		SLAccountNUmber, AccountStatus, PaymentAmount, PaymentDate, CurrentAccountBalance, AcountArrears, TerminationBalance, 
		OldCurrentAccountBalance, OldAcountArrears, OldTerminationBalance, MiscellaneousCreditAmount, MiscellaneousCreditType,  Notes, 
		AuthenticatedUserID, DateAdded, LastUpdate,GasRateCode,PaymentBillingPeriod)
	SELECT CAST(UtilityCompanyID AS int), CAST(AccountBillingGroup AS int), BillingPeriod, BillingPeriodRevision, AccountNumber+'0000', MeterReadWorkDay, 
		UtilityServiceAccountName, UtilityServiceAddress, Borough, Zipcode, State, ActivityCode, ActivityDate, ActivityTime, cast([ActivityDate]+' '+[ActivityTime] as datetime),TransactionCode, 
		SLAccountNUmber+SLWorkDay+'00', -- Convert to old EC3 format
		AccountStatus, CAST(PaymentAmount AS money), PaymentDate, CAST(CurrentAccountBalance AS money), 
		CAST(AcountArrears AS money), CAST(TerminationBalance AS money), CAST(OldCurrentAccountBalance AS money), CAST(OldAcountArrears AS money), 
		CAST(OldTerminationBalance AS money), CAST(MiscellaneousCreditAmount AS money), MiscellaneousCreditType,NULL,@AuthenticatedUserID,
		GETDATE(),GETDATE(),GasRateCode,@PaymentBillingPeriod
	FROM CrisNationalGridWest.UploadPaymentDetailPreload;

	PRINT 'CrisNationalGridWest.UploadMeterReadDetailPreload row count: '+str(@@rowcount);

	SET @StatusCode = 0;
END;
